virtual String Stream::getline ( size_t  maxSize = 99999999  )  [inline, virtual]

Reads 1 line from the stream.

Note:
The stream pointer is advanced as well
Parameters:
maxSize Optional param which specifies max data to pull

size_t Stream::length (  )  const [inline]

int Stream::loadFile ( const String &  file  )  [virtual]

Load a file into the stream.

Returns:
1 on error, 0 on success.
Parameters:
fname File to read from
Note:
this.loading is set to 1 during this process.

Uses puts() for populating the stream.

See also:
puts

int Stream::loadFile ( const int  fd  )  [virtual]

Load a file into the stream.

Returns:
1 on error, 0 on success.
Parameters:
fd File descriptor to read from
Note:
this.loading is set to 1 during this process.

Uses puts() for populating the stream.

The fd is not closed.

See also:
puts

Reads specified number of bytes from the stream.

Parameters:

' will return 1 line.
